Question: Dreame Innovation Technology (Suzhou) Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dreame Innovation Technology (Suzhou) Co.,Ltd

Product: X30 Ultra

- 8,300Pa Vormax™ Suction
- MopExtend™ flexibility
- Auto Maintenance
- TriCut Brush
- Smart mapping and easy app control
- MopExtend™ technology reaches 4cm²
- Full auto care: dust collection, hot water mop self-cleaning, hot air drying, and water and solution adding
- Anti-tangle TriCut brush
- Presence in over 120 countries
- Trusted by 21 million households
